Latest Posts

  • Lagrange interpolation

    15 Nov 2020

    Perhaps the most straightforward $\gamma=\lim_{n\to\infty}\left(\sum_{k=1}^n\frac1k-ln(n)\right)$ interpolation method is Lagrange interpolation. We shall look at a derivation of the formula for an $n$th degree polynomial that passes through $n-1$ points.
